text: The 1980 Prize of Moscow News was the 15th edition of an international figure skating competition organized in Moscow, Soviet Union. It was held December 10–14, 1980. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating and ice dancing. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
